name: My best friend is a ghost!
name_original: My best friend is a ghost!
description:
Description

A short puzzle game made in a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2. The theme was "You're not alone". The game is a block pushing puzzle game where you're haunted by a ghost. Some of the blocks can only be pushed by the ghost, so you need to cooperate with your pursuer to solve the puzzles.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • R to restart level
  • Escape to pause

The ghost will follow your footsteps to the best of it's ability, if it cannot follow directly to a spot you walked on then it will instead use pathfinding to navigate back onto your trail before following again.
